scenario.title: The Night City Heist
scenario.prologue_text: In the dark alleys of Night City, where the neon lights never dim and the rain never stops, you've received a message from an unknown sender. The message reads: 'Meet me at the old clock tower at midnight. Come alone.' You've heard rumors of a powerful artifact hidden somewhere in the city, and you suspect this meeting might be related to it. As you prepare for the meeting, you can't help but feel a sense of excitement and trepidation. What will you find at the clock tower, and what dangers will you face in the shadows of Night City?
global_rules: You can only carry a maximum of 5 items in your inventory.
You must rest at a safe location to recover health.

npcs.name: 춘식 더 제임스
npcs.background: 부랑자들의 왕. 이트 시티에서 가장 어두운 곳의 대장이다.
npcs.personality: Charismatic and cunning, Chun-sik is a natural leader who commands respect from his followers. However, he is also ruthless and will stop at nothing to achieve his goals.
npcs.description: 금발 머리, 피어싱, 태닝한 것처럼 갈색으로 빛나는 피부, 온 임플란트로 번이는 두 팔.

scenes.title: The Clock Tower Meeting
scenes.description: You arrive at the old clock tower, and as you enter, you see a figure waiting for you in the shadows. It's Chun-sik, the king of the vagabonds. He reveals that he has information about the artifact you're looking for, but he's not willing to share it for free.

choices.text: Offer to trade something of value for the information.
Refuse to deal with Chun-sik and try to leave.

scenes.title: The Trade
scenes.description: Chun-sik agrees to trade the information for the valuable item you offered. He hands you a map with the location of the artifact, but warns you that you're not the only one looking for it.

scenes.title: The Confrontation
scenes.description: Chun-sik and his followers attack you as you try to leave. You must defend yourself and escape.

endings.title: The Successful Heist
endings.description: You successfully retrieve the artifact and escape Night City with your life.
endings.condition: You have the artifact in your inventory and your hp is above 0.

endings.title: The Failed Heist
endings.description: You fail to retrieve the artifact and are forced to flee Night City empty-handed.
endings.condition: You do not have the artifact in your inventory or your hp is 0.
